description:
As a merchant
  I want to add text to Order Confirmation Email footer and header
  So that shoppers will see it in the email after checkout
name: Add custom text to email order notification header / footer and check email receive correctly（Simplified Chinese)

elements.name: Custom Text and Simplified Chinese Support in Order notification email Header and Footer

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Custom Notification Page
I click on tab included 'Order'
I should see order notification button
I click on order notification button
I should be redirected to Custom Order Notification Page
I click on language tab included 'Simplified Chinese'

embeddings.data: {"selectorValue":"react-app > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > div"}

I should see footer edit button
I should see english email picture
I click on header edit button
I should see editor toolbar
I should see html text field
I input 'Order notification email header 简体 test' to 1st html text field

embeddings.data: {"value":"Order notification email header 简体 test"}

I click on open link in new window checkbox
I click on link option button included 'Add'

I switch to 2 of tabs
I should be redirected to Shop Home Page
I switch to 1 of tabs
I should be redirected to Custom Order Notification Page
1st html text field should contain 'Order notification email header 简体 test'
